long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HidePolitical content from X (formerly twitter). This tool analyses tweets & images to ensure political content is minimised from your feed (or hopefully gone). This tool blocks content that is not possible via muting keywords such as political content in images. HidePolitics also hides trending topics from the home & explore page which include political content
